Title: Filtering Endpoints
Description: Develop API endpoints for filtering questions based on various criteria such as subject, topic, subtopic, difficulty level, or tags. The endpoints should accept filtering parameters, query the database efficiently, and return the filtered results in a paginated manner. Proper validation and error handling should be implemented.
Acceptance Criteria:
Filtering endpoints implemented
Accepts Filtering parameters
Queries database efficiently
Returns paginated Results
Proper validation and error handling
tested with different Filtering scenarios
